item.title: Zbrojovka Brno 262.5
item.description: History This board was manufactured by a Czechoslovakian company called Zbrojovka Brno in the late ’80s. Zbrojovka Brno manufactured small arms, motor vehicles, and later typewriters and computers. This board was made in 1988, and it uses the Soviet-era Tesla hall effect switches. Zbrojovka Brno 265.6 back Acquisition & Restoration It had been up for sale for more than a year on r/mechmarket , and I was lucky enough to snag it for a very fair price.
